open_ended_feedback_response: my understanding of how our brain interprets and understands sounds is very limited so this might not be useful, but for the first task it may be worth asking participants what languages they have had exposure to/ learnt during their childhood? only because i dont think just where theyre from and their race tells you that info, and my understanding is that exposure to different languages effects how the brain understands different sounds?
